name: Back to the Earth
description:
You are about to go on a space journey.
You will be able to find out the reason for your abduction and help new friends.
You have to solve puzzles by finding and combining objects.

How to play:

Read the dialogues carefully.
Look for items and combine them to complete levels.

Found items appear in the backpack.
They can be dragged onto objects or onto each other.
To show/hide them, click the backpack icon.
